title: Value of the U.S. tableware market 2012 , by category
yAxis: Market value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The Value U.S. Category in the market 2012 was Category Beverage/stemware , who made 3.3 value .
The most U.S. Category was Cutlery , with just 0.9 value .

In second place was Category Pantry/kitchen with 2.2 value ; third place went to Category Cookware with 3.3 value ; fourth place went to Category Flatware with 0.9 value and fifth place went to Category Dinnerware , who made 1.9 value .
gold: This statistic depicts the value of the U.S. tableware market in 2012 . In 2012 , cookware generated about 3.3 billion U.S. dollars for the U.S. tabletop market . The total market value of the U.S. tabletop market was about 12.2 billion U.S. dollars .
